snippet: The company pared its sales outlook for the fourth quarter and full year, saying that it expected only modest economic growth in most of the world next year.
lead_paragraph: The company pared its sales outlook for the fourth quarter and full year, saying that it expected only modest economic growth in most of the world next year.

headline.main: Honeywell Forecasts Growth to Be Less Than Expected
headline.print_headline: Honeywell Forecasts Growth To Be Less Than Expected
